Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to ticket pricing
Summary: Relates to ticket pricing; requires that the price of admission disclosed at the initiation of a sale (including face-to-face transactions) include the entire price to be paid inclusive of all service charges and fees other than delivery fees; and relates to the effectiveness of such requirement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to ticket pricing
